hero.title: HuiRuJin
hero.subtitle: Lawyer & Professional Diver
hero.description: Combining legal expertise with a passion for underwater exploration to provide comprehensive maritime law services and diving expertise.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Professional Excellence Both Above and Below the Surface
about.introduction: I am a dedicated maritime lawyer and accomplished technical diver, bringing together two worlds that share common values: precision, safety, and respect for the environment.

legal_background.title: Legal Background
legal_background.description: With over 8 years of experience in maritime and environmental law, I specialize in complex international shipping disputes, marine environmental protection, and corporate maritime transactions.

diving_journey.title: Diving Journey
diving_journey.description: My underwater adventures span 12 years and over 500 dives across 15 countries. From technical deep dives to cave exploration, I bring the same attention to detail and safety protocols that define my legal practice.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Just as diving requires careful planning, precise execution, and respect for the environment, practicing law demands thorough preparation, meticulous attention to detail, and unwavering ethical standards.

maritime.title: Maritime Law
maritime.description: Comprehensive legal services for maritime disputes, vessel transactions, and international shipping regulations.

environmental.title: Environmental Law
environmental.description: Protecting marine ecosystems through comprehensive environmental compliance and litigation services.

corporate.title: Corporate Law
corporate.description: Business formation, mergers & acquisitions, and corporate governance for marine industry clients.

consultation.title: Schedule a Consultation
consultation.description: Get expert legal advice tailored to your maritime law needs.

conservation.title: Conservation Efforts
conservation.description: Committed to protecting marine environments through active participation in conservation projects.

blog.title: Blog & Insights
blog.subtitle: Sharing Knowledge from Legal Practice and Diving Adventures
